marklogic.body:
so, was the DA investigating the case before the uproar occurred, or had they completely dismissed even looking into it? Was the matter completely over, or were they behind the scenes still looking into it? If these matters can take a year or so to be Resolved, do we know for certain that nothing was being done on their part?Â
Are they investigating it now, only because of the uproar? If so, wouldn't that be the DA that dropped the ball, and not the police?Â
Of course, they didn't have a drug and alcohol test from Zimmerman...did they have photos of him Bleeding? He was treated, at the scene I believe, for his injuries.Â
What's up with this?"Police play the 911 tape for Trayvon Martin's father, who tells police that the voice screaming is not the voice of his son."http://news.yahoo.com/video/orlandowesh-16122564/zimmerman-self-defense-claim-disputed-28692404.html
